content: Even after four published books I found it suddenly became impossible because the market is overcrowded — not because my books weren’t good enough — I got great reviews and a good email list of people who wanted to learn more but in the end it is down to money and celebrity and that is all. I have close friends who work in the publishing industry and can talk up close and personal with whoever they want to and even they cant get their books published although they are good reads and worthy — no it is not impossible but it is not at all easy — I now only really favour the online self publishing route and rely on good friends to give honest feedback xx
